alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Casper Mountain; Cody Foothills; East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Rock Springs and Green River; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Big Horn Basin; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:13PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with strong wind gusts into this evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service office in Riverton. * WHAT...Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph with occasional gusts to 60 mph are possible with any shower or thunderstorm. * WHERE...Most of central and southern Wyoming. * WHEN...Through 10 pm tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts can occur several miles away from any shower or thunderstorm, even if no rain is occurring.
